entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
